item.title: Re: Bonuses Page
item.content:encoded:
Minor Downtime Penalty! -3 Levels!: You drank more Juice than your tolerance, and suffered a penalty to your Levels.
WhiteEye Training Bonus! +4 Levels!: You're a White Eye Sannin, and White Eyes get passive bonuses to their Levels in regular missions dependent on their Rank.
Sand Monument Bonus! +1 Stamina!: Your village has beaten the Demon of the Sand and gotten the Sand Demon Monument. You get 1 Stamina back every time you complete a mission.
Ichi Special Ramen Bonus!: You ate the Ichi Special provided by the upgrade Ninja Cooking School and now have 2x Find Chance
Difficulty Bonus! +25% Ryo!: You're running missions on Crank 5, and each Crank gives +5% Ryo
Captain's Bonus! +10% AP/XP!: You have the Permanent Item Captain's Jacket
Money for Nothing Bonus! +25% Ryo!: Your current active Ending Theme is Money for Nothing
Teachings Bonus! +10% AP/XP!: Your village has the upgrade Ancient Teachings
Science Bonus! +20% Ryo!: The second function of your village's second Science! machine
It Prints Money Bonus! +25% Ryo!: You have the Permanent Item Money Printer
Shortbunny Bonus! +10% Ryo!: You have the Permanent Item Shortbunny
Ninja-Mas Bonus! +10% Ryo!: You have the Permanent Item Ninja-mas Star
Letter of Marque Bonus! +10% Ryo/AP/XP!: You have the Permanent Item Letter of Marque
Sannin Bonus! +15% Ryo!: You have the Permanent Item Sannin's Premium
Carapace Armor bonus! +10% Tai AP!: You have the Permanent Item Carapace Armor
Pose bonus! +10% Nin AP!: Your Village has the upgrade Pose Training from beating the Bishounen
Muscle bonus! +10% Tai AP!: Your village has the upgrade Muscle Training from beating the Pro Wrestlers
Boot Bonus! +50 Chakra!: You have the Permanent Item Boots of Walking
Sandstorm Bonus! +3 MPH!: You have the Permanent Item Wasteland Cowl
